name: Escape The Black Hound (TheLazyPoodleMen, jayebur, laurenk, Pat R)
name_original: Escape The Black Hound (TheLazyPoodleMen, jayebur, laurenk, Pat R)
description:
Controls: WASD to move, space to jump

You are in Galway and the legendary black hound is after you! If he catches you he will drag you away to the fairy realms. DO NOT LET HIM CATCH YOU!

Collect the blue bottles to slow the black hound. jump over benches, go around the stalls. Get the highest score you can!

This is an in-development game, with only some of the systems we want to eventually have. First shown as part of the Wild Galway Gaming Initiative 2022, our aim is to polish it up, expand the content and release it on mobile and itch. We're a group of amateurs having some fun, hoping to take things further and any and all feedback is appreciated
